query:
WITH job_sizes AS (
                            SELECT 
                                cj.id,
                                cj.workspace_id,
                                cj.parent_job,
                                cj.created_by,
                                cj.duration_ms,
                                cj.success,
                                cj.script_hash,
                                cj.script_path,
                                cj.args,
                                cj.result,
                                cj.deleted,
                                cj.canceled,
                                cj.canceled_by,
                                cj.canceled_reason,
                                cj.job_kind,
                                cj.schedule_path,
                                cj.permissioned_as,
                                cj.is_flow_step,
                                cj.language,
                                cj.is_skipped,
                                cj.email,
                                cj.visible_to_owner,
                                cj.mem_peak,
                                cj.tag,
                                cj.created_at,
                                cj.started_at,
                                job_logs.logs,
                                job_logs.log_offset,
                                job_logs.log_file_index,
                                -- Estimate size in bytes based on actual data characteristics
                                (36 + -- UUID
                                 COALESCE(LENGTH(cj.workspace_id), 0) + 
                                 COALESCE(LENGTH(cj.created_by), 0) + 
                                 COALESCE(LENGTH(cj.script_path), 0) + 
                                 COALESCE(LENGTH(cj.args::text), 0) + 
                                 COALESCE(LENGTH(cj.result::text), 0) + 
                                 COALESCE(LENGTH(job_logs.logs), 0) + 
                                 200) AS estimated_size_bytes -- Other fields overhead
                            FROM v2_as_completed_job AS cj
                            LEFT JOIN job_logs ON cj.id = job_logs.job_id
                            WHERE cj.created_at < $1
                            LIMIT 5000
                        ),
                        cumulative_sizes AS (
                            SELECT 
                                *,
                                SUM(estimated_size_bytes) OVER (
                                    ORDER BY created_at ASC 
                                    ROWS UNBOUNDED PRECEDING
                                ) AS cumulative_size_bytes
                            FROM job_sizes
                        )
                        SELECT
                            id AS "id!",
                            workspace_id AS "workspace_id!",
                            parent_job,
                            created_by AS "created_by!",
                            duration_ms AS "duration_ms!",
                            success AS "success!",
                            script_hash AS "script_hash!: Option<ScriptHash>",
                            script_path,
                            args AS "args: sqlx::types::Json<HashMap<String, Box<RawValue>>>",
                            result AS "result: sqlx::types::Json<Box<RawValue>>",
                            deleted AS "deleted!",
                            canceled AS "canceled!",
                            canceled_by,
                            canceled_reason,
                            job_kind AS "job_kind!: JobKind",
                            schedule_path,
                            permissioned_as AS "permissioned_as!",
                            is_flow_step AS "is_flow_step!",
                            language AS "language: ScriptLang",
                            is_skipped AS "is_skipped!",
                            email AS "email!",
                            visible_to_owner AS "visible_to_owner!",
                            mem_peak,
                            tag AS "tag!",
                            created_at AS "created_at!",
                            started_at,
                            logs,
                            log_offset AS "log_offset?",
                            log_file_index
                        FROM cumulative_sizes
                        WHERE cumulative_size_bytes <= $2
                        ORDER BY created_at ASC
